traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Scintillating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw, taking 49 (11d8 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 25 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Starlight Strike (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon releases a searing beam of starlight at a creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 38 ({@damage 11d6}) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):
